Module Paint3001
Package paint

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.Action
      • paint.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaintEllipse, PaintLine, PaintPlot, PaintPolygon, PaintRectangle
    public abstract class Shape
extends Action
    Extends Action to create new shape, gets and checks coordinates of the shape
